Title: Relates to drivers of buses, taxis and livery vehicles using hands-free mobile telephones
Summary: Prohibits drivers of a bus, taxi or livery from using hands-free mobile telephones; provides for certain exceptions.
LawCode: Amd ยง1225-c, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to drivers of buses, taxis and livery vehicles using hands-free mobile telephones
